verses.verse: Now the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> came <S%H5927><s%> up from Gilgal <S%H1537><s%> to Bochim. <S%H1066><s%> And he said, <S%H559><s%> "I brought <S%H5927><s%> you up out of Egypt <S%H4714><s%> and led <S%H935><s%> you into the land <S%H776><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I have sworn <S%H7650><s%> to your fathers; and I said, <S%H1><s%> 'I will never <S%H559><s%> <S%H3808><s%> break <S%H5769><s%> My covenant <S%H6565><s%> with you,

and as for you, you shall make <S%H3772><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> covenant <S%H1285><s%> with the inhabitants <S%H3427><s%> of this <S%H2088><s%> land; <S%H776><s%> you shall tear <S%H5422><s%> down <S%H5422><s%> their altars. <S%H4196><s%>' But you have not obeyed <S%H8085><s%> <S%H6963><s%> Me; what <S%H4100><s%> is this <S%H2088><s%> you have done <S%H6213><s%>?

"Therefore I also <S%H1571><s%> said, <S%H559><s%> 'I will not drive <S%H1644><s%> them out before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> you; but they shall become <S%H1961><s%> [as thorns] in your sides, <S%H6654><s%> and their gods <S%H430><s%> shall be a snare <S%H4170><s%> to you.'"

And it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the angel <S%H4397><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> spoke <S%H1696><s%> these <S%H428><s%> words <S%H1697><s%> to all <S%H3605><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel, <S%H3478><s%> that the people <S%H5971><s%> lifted <S%H5375><s%> up their voices <S%H6963><s%> and wept. <S%H1058><s%>
So they named <S%H7121><s%> <S%H8034><s%> that place <S%H4725><s%> Bochim; <S%H1066><s%> and there <S%H8033><s%> they sacrificed <S%H2076><s%> to the Lord. <S%H3068><s%>

When Joshua <S%H3091><s%> had dismissed <S%H7971><s%> the people, <S%H5971><s%> the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> went <S%H1980><s%> each <S%H376><s%> to his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> to possess <S%H3423><s%> the land. <S%H776><s%>

And the people <S%H5971><s%> served <S%H5647><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> and all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the elders <S%H2205><s%> who <S%H834><s%> survived <S%H748><s%> <S%H3117><s%> <S%H310><s%> Joshua, <S%H3091><s%> who <S%H834><s%> had seen <S%H7200><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the great <S%H1419><s%> work <S%H4639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> which <S%H834><s%> He had done <S%H6213><s%> for Israel. <S%H3478><s%>

Then Joshua <S%H3091><s%> the son <S%H1121><s%> of Nun, <S%H5126><s%> the servant <S%H5650><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> died <S%H4191><s%> at the age <S%H1121><s%> of one hundred <S%H3967><s%> and ten. <S%H6235><s%>

And they buried <S%H6912><s%> him in the territory <S%H1366><s%> of his inheritance <S%H5159><s%> in Timnath-heres, in the hill <S%H2022><s%> country <S%H2022><s%> of Ephraim, <S%H669><s%> north <S%H6828><s%> of Mount <S%H2022><s%> Gaash. <S%H1608><s%>

And all <S%H3605><s%> that generation also <S%H1571><s%> were gathered <S%H622><s%> to their fathers; and there arose <S%H1><s%> another <S%H6965><s%> generation after <S%H312><s%> them who <S%H310><s%> did not know <S%H834><s%> the Lord, <S%H3045><s%> nor <S%H3068><s%> yet <S%H1571><s%> the work <S%H1571><s%> which <S%H4639><s%> He had done <S%H834><s%> for Israel. <S%H6213><s%>
Then the sons <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%> did <S%H6213><s%> evil <S%H7451><s%> in the sight <S%H5869><s%> of the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> the Baals, <S%H1168><s%>

and they forsook <S%H5800><s%> the Lord, <S%H3068><s%> the God <S%H430><s%> of their fathers, who had brought <S%H1><s%> them out of the land <S%H3318><s%> of Egypt, <S%H776><s%> and followed <S%H4714><s%> <S%H1980><s%> other <S%H310><s%> gods <S%H312><s%> from [among] the gods <S%H430><s%> of the peoples <S%H430><s%> who <S%H5971><s%> were around <S%H834><s%> them, and bowed <S%H5439><s%> themselves down <S%H7812><s%> to them; thus they provoked <S%H7812><s%> the Lord <S%H3707><s%> to anger. <S%H3068><s%>
So they forsook <S%H5800><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> and served <S%H5647><s%> Baal <S%H1168><s%> and the Ashtaroth. <S%H9441><s%>

And the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and He gave <S%H5414><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of plunderers <S%H8154><s%> who plundered <S%H8155><s%> them; and He sold <S%H4376><s%> them into the hands <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H340><s%> around <S%H5439><s%> [them,] so that they could <S%H3201><s%> no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H5750><s%> stand <S%H5975><s%> before <S%H6440><s%> their enemies. <S%H340><s%>

Wherever <S%H3605><s%> <S%H834><s%> they went, <S%H3318><s%> the hand <S%H3027><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was against them for evil, <S%H9567><s%> as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had spoken <S%H1696><s%> and as the Lord <S%H3068><s%> had sworn <S%H7650><s%> to them, so that they were severely <S%H3966><s%> distressed. <S%H9503><s%>
Then the Lord <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> up judges <S%H8199><s%> who delivered <S%H3467><s%> them from the hands <S%H3027><s%> of those who plundered <S%H8154><s%> them.

And yet <S%H1571><s%> they did not listen <S%H8085><s%> to their judges, <S%H8199><s%> for they played <S%H2181><s%> the harlot <S%H2181><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> gods <S%H430><s%> and bowed <S%H7812><s%> themselves down <S%H7812><s%> to them. They turned <S%H5493><s%> aside <S%H5493><s%> quickly <S%H4118><s%> from the way <S%H1870><s%> in which <S%H834><s%> their fathers had walked <S%H1><s%> in obeying <S%H1980><s%> the commandments <S%H8085><s%> of the Lord; <S%H4687><s%> they did <S%H3068><s%> not do <S%H6213><s%> as [their fathers].

And when <S%H3588><s%> the Lord <S%H3068><s%> raised <S%H6965><s%> up judges <S%H8199><s%> for them, the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was with the judge <S%H8199><s%> and delivered <S%H3467><s%> them from the hand <S%H3027><s%> of their enemies <S%H340><s%> all <S%H3605><s%> the days <S%H3117><s%> of the judge; <S%H8199><s%> for the Lord <S%H3068><s%> was moved <S%H5162><s%> to pity <S%H5162><s%> by their groaning <S%H5009><s%> because <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> of those who oppressed <S%H3905><s%> and afflicted <S%H1766><s%> them.

But it came <S%H1961><s%> about when the judge <S%H8199><s%> died, <S%H4194><s%> that they would turn <S%H7725><s%> back <S%H7725><s%> and act <S%H7843><s%> more <S%H4480><s%> corruptly <S%H7843><s%> than <S%H4480><s%> their fathers, in following <S%H1><s%> <S%H1980><s%> other <S%H310><s%> gods <S%H312><s%> to serve <S%H430><s%> them and bow <S%H5647><s%> down <S%H7812><s%> to them; they did not abandon <S%H7812><s%> their practices <S%H5307><s%> or their stubborn <S%H4611><s%> ways. <S%H7186><s%>

So the anger <S%H639><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> burned <S%H2734><s%> against Israel, <S%H3478><s%> and He said, <S%H559><s%> "Because <S%H3282><s%> <S%H834><s%> this <S%H2088><s%> nation <S%H1471><s%> has transgressed <S%H5674><s%> My covenant <S%H1285><s%> which <S%H834><s%> I commanded <S%H6680><s%> their fathers, and has not listened <S%H1><s%> to My voice, <S%H8085><s%>

I also <S%H1571><s%> will no <S%H3808><s%> longer <S%H3254><s%> drive <S%H3423><s%> out before <S%H4480><s%> <S%H6440><s%> them any <S%H376><s%> of the nations <S%H1471><s%> which <S%H834><s%> Joshua <S%H3091><s%> left <S%H5800><s%> when he died, <S%H4191><s%>

in order <S%H4616><s%> to test <S%H5254><s%> Israel <S%H3478><s%> by them, whether they will keep <S%H8104><s%> the way <S%H1870><s%> of the Lord <S%H3068><s%> to walk <S%H1980><s%> in it as their fathers did, <S%H1><s%> or <S%H8104><s%> not. "

So the Lord <S%H3068><s%> allowed those <S%H428><s%> nations <S%H1471><s%> to remain, <S%H5117><s%> not driving <S%H3423><s%> them out quickly; <S%H4118><s%> and He did not give <S%H5414><s%> them into the hand <S%H3027><s%> of Joshua. <S%H3091><s%>
